There is no such thing as "American evangelicalism", there are only Kingdom minded people who are called to be Holy!  And there is no such thing as "LGBT Christians", there are only Jesus's followers who “have crucified the flesh with the passions and the lusts“.

The Revoice people are going astray.  And they do them all in the name of G-d.

And they are [calling](https://twitter.com/PrestonSprinkle/status/1034224108974694400) each other deity.

And the Senator from Hawaii is asking all men to "shut up".
